Bipolar Transistor and Related Devices7. MOSFET and Related Devices8. MESFET and Related Devices9. Photonic Devices

name.zh: 高科技專利之財產取得與應用
name.en: The obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent

description.zh: 「高科技專利之財產取得與應用」內容包括：專利的意涵與其重要法規, 專利實體審查基準, 專利審查實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵權鑑定, 專利舉發實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵害及訴訟實例分析, 專利行政救濟, 簡易專利地圖製作, 專利分析與其戰略佈局, 專利迴避應用與技術創新, 技術產權管理相關理論的熟悉與運用。
description.en: The contents of "the obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent" comprises: the meaning of the patent and important rules of patent, patent substantive examination procedures, reading and analyzing about patent substantive examination cases, patent infringement verification, reading and analyzing cases for patent invalidation action, analyzing cases for patent infringement and litigation, patent administrative remedy, fabrication of simple patent map, patent analysis and strategy, application of patent around and technical innovation, and familiarity and exercise of related theories of technique property.

description.zh: 每週六小時二學分的專業必修課，旨在訓練碩一新生能在短時間內學習各種生物科技必須且基本的實驗技術並能有通盤的了解。課程的安排除了在生物科技所的教授實驗室中學習外，也將安排學生至中央研究院、國立臺灣大學、長庚大學及醫院、國防醫學大學及業界生物科技公司學習先進的生物科技的實驗方法和技術。
description.en: This course will provide students to learn essential and basic methods and experiments in biotechnology. The students must learn the methods and experiments in laboratories of the professors in Institute of Biotechnology, Academia Sinica, National Taiwan University, Chang Gung University, National Defense University and biotech companies.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、生物化學知識及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course covers topics in the interdisciplinary of organic chemistry and biochemistry. Both areas employ techniques of organic chemistry and biochemistry to better understand and/or to manipulate biological processes. Both areas employ model compounds as relatively simple structures used to understand very complex biological phenomena. Bioorganic Chemistry (Chemical Genetics, Chemical Biology, Molecular recognition/supramolecular Chemistry, Biomimetic Chemistry) applies the principles and techniques of organic chemistry to solve a problem relevant to biology or to perform an organic chemical study inspired by a biological observation.

notes: 生技所必修,an elective course for EOMP students

description.zh: 本課程將結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程首先介紹微生物在發酵過程中所扮演之角色。其次在本課程中擬就有關生物細胞的各種`性質中，認為特別重要的事項，譬如發酵槽應該控制的環境因子，以及生體催化劑所呈現的動態特性加以描述。尤其特別注意到化學工程的精銳項目，如反應裝置(發酵槽)的設計與運轉操作等。接著介紹產品之純化相關的基本知識與技術。最近發酵技術的進步非常快速，許多新的物質採用發酵法生產。因此相關技術之介紹也會在本課程中提出。
description.en: First of all, the role of microorganism in the fermentation is introduced in this course. In the course, the most important categories for the properties of the cells, such as the environmental factors to be controlled, dynamic characteristics of enzyme, should be delineated. Particularly, the course would eonphasize the most part of chemical engineering, such as the reactor (fermenter) design and operation. Then, the fundamental knowledge and technique of purification of bioproduct will be introduced. In the recent years, many new products are produced by the method of fermentation. Therefore the related technology will be presented in this course.

description.zh: 本課程講授重點為介紹?維至三維?米材?及其生物醫學及各高科技產業的應用。內容包含合成與製備方法、先進?米製程與?米檢測技術，以及探討?米材?優?的性能，包括?米粉體、?米碳管、?米模板之製備，以及?米自組裝?米加工最新技術。
description.en: The objective of this course is to understand the synthesis, characterization and application of zero to three dimension nanomaterials. And also introduction the unique properties of nanomaterials and their potential applications of different industrial field. Teaching contents including the process of nanopowders, carbon nanotube nano-templates, and technology of the self-assembly and nano-fabrication, etc.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹新型觸媒之合成及鑑定，與探討數個工業觸媒之應用例。內容包括催化與吸附之原理、新型奈米催化劑之合成與鑑定、工廠觸媒之操作、反應物之純化處理。工業應用包括蒸氣重組、甲烷化、氨氣合成、高分子聚合催化、氧化催化、立體選擇有機合成上之應用等。
description.en: Introducing to the basic principles for catalyst, the synthesis of mesoporous molecular sieve systems, surfactant-stabilized nanosized colloidal metals and alloys as catalyst precursors,the synthesis and characterize the nanostructured catalysts: nanocrystalline Zeolites, pillared clays, metal and metal oxide. Industrial applications: steam reforming, the water-gas shift reaction, ammonia synthesis, catalytic olefin polymerization, catalytic oxidation, stereoselective synthesis in Organic Chemistry are emphasized.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 一、張量分析(Tensor  analysis)二、熱性質(Thermal properties)三、電性質(Electrical  Properties)四、介電性質(Dielectric  Properties)五、磁性質(Magnetic  Properties)六、 光學性質(Optical  Properties)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Physical properties of Material.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹各種金屬表面被覆之基本原理，特性測試及其工程上之應用。內容有擴散被覆、PVD、CVD、電鍍及陽極處理等方法；基本真空技術，被覆層特性，以及表面被覆層之應用。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles of metals surface coating，properties test and its engineering applications.The contents include Diffusion Coatings、PVD、CVD、Electroplatings and Anodic Coatings treatment；Elementary Vacuum Technologies，coating layer properties and its applications.

description.zh: 一、簡介(Outline)二、導電材料(Conductors)三、電阻材料(Resistors)四、絕緣材料(Insulators)五、半導體材料(Semiconductors)六、介電材料(Dielectrics)七、磁性材料(Magnetics)八、壓電材料(Piezoelectrics)九、超導材料(Superconductors)十、感測材料(Sensors)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Electronic Materials.

description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程在第一個問題上，我們將介紹材料發展上的挑戰，一者為材料與生物分子間的表面性質及特性﹔再者為材料做為細胞，生長模版並植入修復器官的效果。接著在第二個問題將以細胞為主題，介紹生物細胞學將是重要主題，如幹細胞生物學、細胞移動、組織環境、及組織功能基質細胞之研究等。在第三個問題上，主要描述特殊器官與工程學上之關係，與極可能在臨床的發展與應用。組織工程之性質與應用在外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括組織工程之發展,材料之應用,軟硬組織在生醫工程之應用。
description.en: The class is going to give a basic principle to the students in cell sources, cell-cell communications, stem cells, material for scaffold, extracellular matrix for tissue engineering. This class is intended not only as a class for engineering students and students in cell biology, biotechnology, and medical courses at advanced graduate level, but also as a reference tool for research and clinical laboratories. I believe the students can have the knowledge of tissue engineering after the class finished. The topics of this course include the tissue of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor tissue, composite materials in biomedical engineerings.

description.zh: 研究所課程綱要： 1.非晶質材料之組成和結構 2.玻璃形成及相分離 3.晶質化過程 4.非晶質材料的特性─機械、熱、電、磁、光、抗蝕性質 5.非晶質材料的應用
description.en: Course Outlines： Special topics of 1.Composition and Structure of Amorphous Materials 2.Glass Formation and Immiscibility 3.Devitrification of Glass 4.Properties of Amorphous Materials─Mechanical, Thermal, Electrical, Magnetic, Optical, Chemical Properties 5.Applications of Amorphous Materials

name.zh: 穿透式電子顯微鏡實作技術
name.en: Analytic technique of Transmission electron microscope

description.zh: 本課程為「電子顯微鏡學」之進階課程暨實習。教導實際操作離子削薄機、鍍碳機、及高解析穿透式電子顯微鏡之分析技術。內容含有試樣的製作、離子削薄機工作原理、TEM基本結構、儀器校準及電子束調整、繞射圖案之取得、各種繞射操作技巧之應用及成像、EDS操作、軟體應用及底片處理等。
description.en: The class is the further class of electron microscopy. It focuses on the operations of ion miller, carbon coater and high resolution transmission electron microscope technique. Content includes the specimen preparations, the work principles of ion miller, TEM basic structure and apparatus, TEM alignments and electron beam adjustments, the formations of diffraction patterns, different operating techniques on diffraction geometry and the formations of images, the EDS operations, software applications, and the treatments of the films.

notes: 限7名修過電顯之研究生

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
description.en: The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括：(1)岩石材料與岩體的工程意義、(2)岩石應力與應變的關係與工程意義、(3) 岩石變形性與強度的工程意義(4)如何辨識不穩定邊坡(5)如何辨識不穩定隧道(6)岩石工程設計理念(7)案例研究等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [II] consist of (1) Rock Material and Rock Mass (2)Stress and Stength (3)Deformability and Stength (4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope  (5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel (6)Rock Engineering Design (7) Engineering Case Studies.

description.zh: 1.原子及其結構 2.化學鍵 3.晶體結構原理 4.結構缺陷、成分與穩定性 5.鍵                                          結與物理性質 6.晶體與光 7.氧化物晶體化學 8.矽酸鹽晶體化學 9.金屬晶                                          體化學 10.高分子結晶化學
description.en: 1.Atoms and their structure 2.Chemicals bonds 3.Principles of crystal structures                                          4.Bonding and physical properties 5.Crystal defects、composition and stability                                          6.Crystal and light 7.Crystal chemistry of oxide 8.Crystal chemistry of silicate                                          9.Crystal chemistry of metal 10.Crystal chemistry of polymer

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程相關之主要數值分析方法及其於大地工程之應用，如有限差分法及有限元素法。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來分析大地工程問題。
description.en: This course introduces two representative numerical methods, i.e.  finite difference method and finite element method, and their application to geotechnical engineering.  Practical engineering problem are illustrated and simulated by numerical methods in the courses.  It aims to train the students to be familiar with either the theorem of numerical analysis or the application to engineering practices.

description.zh: 資源工程的製程技術範圍包括了一些無機性及有機性物質的物理與化學變化。要有效的應用這些物質的製程技術，必須要對製程的輸送現象有基本的認識。而資源工程所涉及的領域也越來越重疊到一些其他工程領域，如陶瓷工程、冶金工程、化學工程、環境工程及生化工程動量，而與輸送現象有關的動量、熱量和質量傳送的原理定律都可應用到這些程序的領域中。本課程的教學目標即在提供學生相關的基本知識，以強化其在相關領域的基本技能。本課程的所涵蓋的基本原理與應用包括：1.	工程原理和單元的簡介2.	動量傳送原理和總均衡3.	動量傳送原理與應用4.	穩態熱量傳送原理5.	非穩態熱量傳送原理6.	質量傳送原理7.	非穩態和對流傳送原理
description.en: Material and resources processing technologies focus on the physical and chemical process of inorganic and organic materials. For effective applications of these processing technologies, understanding the principles of transport phenomena is essential. In the fields of Resources Engineering, many applications are closely related to ceramic engineering, metallurgy engineering, chemical engineering environmental engineering. Therefore, the fundamental principles of momentum transfer, heat transfer and mass transfer can all be applied to these related fields. The purpose of this course is to provide the students with the basic knowledge of transport phenomena, and to enhance the basic skills of related industry sectors.The contents of this course include:1.	introduction of engineering principles and unit operations2.	momentum transfer and total balance3.	principles and applications of momentum transfer4.	principles of steady state heat transfer5.	principles of non-steady state

name.en: Special Topics on Regional Geology of Taiwan

description.zh: 臺灣島位於西太平洋，就板塊構造運動而言，臺灣上新－更新世的造山運動代表歐亞大陸板塊的前緣和其東側以西北方向前進的菲律賓海洋板塊間的衝撞聚合運動。東臺灣花蓮和臺東間的縱谷，已被認為是兩個板塊間的縫合帶和板塊聚合的邊緣。在臺灣的北部，大陸和島弧的碰撞型式可能是菲律賓海板塊向北傾沒到位於歐亞大陸板塊上的琉球島弧系統之下。但是向南沿東臺灣縱谷，在北緯二十四度以南，板塊隱沒方向發生改變，歐亞大陸板塊於此向東隱沒進入菲律賓海板塊之下。此一特殊的板塊背景造就了臺灣多樣的地質現象‧本課程之內容主要探討台灣地區(包括海域)自中生代至現代的大地構造演變及其地體構造運動、盆地演化、岩石圈的結構及性質、造山運動機制等各種地質現象。希望能藉由瞭解臺灣區域地質，從而作為探討臺灣地質工程與環境領域之基礎‧
description.en: Taiwan island is located on the weastern Pacific Ocean. The plate tectonic setting of Taiwan is the convergence and collision between the western Eurasian plate and the easterly impinging Philippine Sea plate on the Pli-Pleistocene. The Longitudinal Valley between Hualien and Taitung in eastern Taiwan has been recognized as the suture zone between these two plates. In northeastern Taiwan, convergence is marked by northward subduction of the Philippine Sea plate beneath the Ryukyu Arc System on the Eurasian plate along the Ryukyu Trench. The subduction polarity changes at 24°N near Hualien in eastern Taiwan. There plate convergence is marked by eastward subduction of the Eurasian plate underneath the Luzon Arc System on the Philippine Sea plate along the Eastern Longitudinal Valley. This distinctive tectonic setting bas brought up various special geologic phenomena on Taiwan The course is aimed at graduate students in the geological engineering, who wish to gain an insight into the s

description.zh: 本課程主要為進階高等固態物理主題:包括基礎量子力學與統計、材料分析、超導、磁性及自旋電子元件、半導體元件、光電元件、原子與分子結構及雷射，低溫、表面和奈米材料等主題，以及探討其在各學科領域之應用。本課程第一部分主要介紹基礎量子力學與統計力學，並將特別介紹一系列巨觀量子效應之實例，包括量子霍爾效應、高溫超導、Bose-Einstein凝聚等有趣的現象。課程中第二部分將介紹奈米材料以及介觀物理、低維度奈米結構之光學性質及電荷傳輸特性。分別從低微體系、定態微擾理論與量子躍遷之關係、共振態與束縛態之關係、散射振幅與束縛定態能級的關係方面深入分析探討，並將特別討論對稱性問題及守恆量分析在散射理論中之重要性；更進一步介紹多體效應中之庫倫效應、協同效應、超導性質以及磁性問題 。最後我們將簡介最新固態物理主題，包括超導、類晶體、自旋玻璃態、稀磁性半導體等新穎領域。課程中藉由深入淺出之例題演練以及投影片及黑板講解，並配合習題演練使學生印象深刻、基礎紮實。以奠定學生日後研究上之深厚基礎。
description.en: Our goal in this course of advanced solid state physics is to provide those aspects of the theory and experiments, which are most needed for a advanced understanding of this topic. The course considers how the large-scale properties of solid materials result from their atomic-scale properties, through methods of quantum mechanics, crystallography, electromagnetism and metallurgy. The first part of this course is to introduce the foundations of quantum mechanics and statistics, including wave-particle duality, expectation value and measurement, eigenstates, boson and fermion. Secondly, we will explain some simple cases about mesoscopic physics of nano-structure materials, including free electron in 1D 2D and 3D, quantum slabs, quantum wires and quantum dots, tunneling and transition problems, transport theory and noise, quantum optics, many body effects and introductory group theory. Finally, we will introduce modern research in this field, including quasicrystals , spintronics , supe

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and approaches, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by wo

description.zh: 互動科技與遍佈運算技術促使建築空間成為整合媒體資訊中介界面。課程目標在利用數位資訊科技以設計使用者為中心、服務導向，敏感、回應與協調的居住環境，促使學習者多重思考未來居住空間之規劃設計可能性，與掌握相關技術。教學除專業課程，與產、官、學研究性、實務利用性的專業講題、個案研討，並輔以報告作品小組討論為評量方式。
description.en: Interaction technology and ubiquitous computing reform architectural space to an integrated media-information interface. The course objectives are to promote students to think planning of the future living space, and designing of a user-centered, service-oriented, sensitive, reflective, coordinated environment by digital interaction technology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中與人的認知行為相關之心智活動知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之認知科學基礎並加以應用，使介面之設計符合使用者的認知需求並具備使用上的效率與舒適度。課程內容包含認知心理學概論、認知心理與介面設計、腦神經認知、感覺訊號的知覺、注意力、記憶力、心智圖象、認知發展、問題解決、創造力以及認知與行為績效等。教學將以課堂講授以及學生分組討論與發表為主要方式，並以報告撰寫以及分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of recognition for interactive design. Students can understand the recognition knowledge and apply it to interactive design, which can meet user recognition requirements and be equipped with efficiency and effectiveness. The contents include recognition introduction, brain nerve recognition, sensor recognition, attention, memory, mental map, recognition development, problem-solution, creative ability and behavior performance. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, group discussion and presentation, and evaluated by student's reports and oral presentation.

name.zh: 互動情境劇本設計企劃

description.zh: 引導學生從人、事、物、環境生活中，發想概念劇本與設計，撰寫文字腳本、分鏡圖，很多概念影片皆是情境劇本發展出來，用工具作創意表現。課程含故事表達，收集，與創意故事發展。本課程之目標在於介紹情境劇本法 (scenario) 之相關知識與其在互動設計上之應用。修習此課程之學生可學習互動情境劇本設計之原理與實作模擬，並具備業界所需之互動介面設計企劃之實務能力與研究分析能力。課程內容包含互動設計理論、情境劇本法、人--機--境概念、互動情境模擬、故事板製作、互動情境劇本設計與互動介面設計演練等。教學方式將以課堂講授、實作演練以及設計企劃案撰寫為主，並以學生的實作發表以及報告為評量方式。
description.en: This course guides students to create scenario design from human, event, object and environment, through drafting script and story board. This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of scenario and its application to interaction design. Students can understand the theory story description, collection and development, so as to do practical work. It is expected that students can be capable of scenario design, design planning and research for practical use. The contents include interaction design, scenario, human-machine-environment, interactive scenario development, story board drafting and practice. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, practical work and scenario proposal, and evaluated by student's reports, and practical work presentation.

name.zh: 互動介面技術原理與應用
name.en: Technology and application on Interactive Interface

description.zh: 由於資訊科技快速發展，生活中許多機能訊息皆有中介媒體傳達著。介面型式也由以往機械式操作演變成今日的電子感應操控，除了功能實用性，互動性與感知性也漸受到重視。同時科技也提升了人們的生活素質，拉近了人們溝通的距離，而科技的人性化，更是設計上不可或缺的考量因素。人造物可與互動介面元素相結合，讓人們不在面對冰冷的機器或產品，它們是可以跟使用者溝通，甚至了解使用者想法並有所行動，這樣的形式同時也為商品加值。本課程將介紹互動元素與互動技術與其應用，並讓學員實際進行操作與應用展示，也從做中學習，如：互動媒體介面(觸控面板)、圖碼與臉部辨識、感測原理與電子電路等。
description.en: With the development of information technology, inter-media play a key role to transfer functionality in our life. This also cause interface type changes from mechanism to electronic sense. Except for functionality, interaction and sensibility start to drive attention. Technology raise people's living quality and narrowing people's distance; user-friendly technology hence becomes a key element for design. With the combination of human-like product and interface, people can communicate with them in naturally way instead of talking to cold machines. This course is focused on introducing state-of-the-art interactive technology (touch interface, icon recognition, sense principle and electronic technology…etc) and their application. Students learn by doing design work and presentation.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 本課程在教授學習者能熟悉建構網站、製作網頁、使用Dreamweaver 的操作環境採用圖形界面處理畫面，並搭配HTML原始碼便可自動產生，此軟體同時可以即時交互編輯修改，編輯文字、插入分隔線、表格製作、超連結、圖形編輯、圖層應用等功能，輕鬆便可產生一般與動態的網頁，整合網頁以及網頁特效設計，甚至包含程式組等多樣式網頁型態。透過此課程學習者能使用此軟體不僅製作一個基本的商業網站，更可以匯入多樣的動態媒體，增加網站內容的互動性與豐富性。 1.基本網路技術 2.網路資料管理技術 3.管理資訊系統技術 4.網路管理資訊系統計樹 5.分散式資料管理技術 6.群體決策支援系統技術 7.網路技術在高階主管資訊系統的應用
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. Learning how to build up the commercial website.with Dreamweaver

description.zh: 本課程的目的是透過專題製作的方式介紹電子商務的基本概念、發展趨勢以及電子商務系統的建構與運作，並討論電子商務的經營管理與未來發展。
description.en: This course introduces the many facets of electronic commerce including basic concepts, current trends, system components and operation. E-commerce strategies, management and future direction issues are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理會計和控制等之成本會計概念介紹，本課程之目的在了解管理會計之實務與應用內涵，並藉以設計及發展管理資訊系統另外，本課程也針對與管會相關之介紹(just-in-time, balanced scorecards, profitability center, investment center …等)與管理決策(外包或自製, 增加產品線,績效評估…等)
description.en: This course deals with management accounting and control both within a micro-behavioural and within an organisational theory perspective. The aim is to provide an understanding of the developments in management accounting and control theory and practice and the implications of critical variables that affect the design, development and operation of management accounting and control systems. Practical aspects of management accounting are mainly examined through computer assisted learning (CAL). Students are expected to cover the prescribed reading on their own, and to perceive the taught seminars as the opportunity to ask questions and to offer their views at any time.

description.zh: 本課程討論利用統計方法進行品質管制，品管方法將運用於市場、設計、採購、生產與檢測。此外，並介紹如何利用全面品管建立並維持高效率之企業組織，以六標準差技術改善產品開發、製造與服務。
description.en: This course provides a fundamental understanding of statistical quality control concept. Areas for quality implementation will include functions such as marketing, design, purchasing, production, inspection, etc. This class also enables the students to recognize the foundation to create and sustain an effective organization through total quality management. Finally, the class provides comprehensive focus on six sigma that has been found to improve product, service and process.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: N
description.en: Piles of literature indicated that technology have been the main source of wealth creation of nations and that of competitive advantage of firms, with a special attention on semiconductor sector and system-on-chip technology. Moreover, technology has also become more complex, uncertain and expensive than ever before. Along with rapid technological change, it is imperative for firms to manage technology in an active and integrated way in order to survive and compete in the increasingly globalized markets. Drawn upon theoretical articles and empirical case study, the course aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of Management of Technology (MOT) with both micro (technology and firm) level and macro (secot and policy) level.

name.en: Forum on Service and Technology Management

description.zh: 本課程主要邀請學術界或企業界的學者專家，從理論或實務的角度，經由演講介紹近代的服務與科技管理專題，促使學生更深入及廣面瞭解管理現狀或趨勢。
description.en: This seminar course invites guest speakers from well known companies to share their experiences of service and technology management and provide students the updated practices and management trends in the field.

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧ 課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more than two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc. The contents of the course: factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在傳授學生智慧財產權的基本概念，並說明比較各國智慧財產權管理制度，期使學生對智慧財產權制度有更完整的認識。最後，讓學生從期末報告及討論中習得智慧財產權實務經驗。
description.en: The goals of this course include: 1. Teaching student the fundamental concept of intellectual property rights (IPR). 2. Describing and comparing the IPR systems in several countries. 3. Practicing the IPR via term project and discussion.

description.zh: 本課程目標在於使學生了解技術移轉的機制以及評估技術在市場機要或商業化時的價值。課程議題包含技術評選、移轉通路、授權、技術交易、技術價值評估各種方法論與實務考量因素，以及與上術議題相關的智慧財產權管理，技術移轉的關鍵成功因素與技術鑑價的操作程序將透過個案加以分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide an insight into the mechanisms of technology transfer and the methodology of technology valuation. The main issues include technology selection, transfer channel, licensing, technology transaction, technology pricing and related IPR problems.

name.zh: 科技政策與國家競爭力
name.en: Science and Technology Policy and National Competitiveness

description.zh: 本專題研究為對針對相關的產業政策理論及國內外經驗研究，以政治經濟學的視野回顧、解讀及展望科技產業政策的作為，特別是我國的經驗。在面臨世界經濟快速變遷下，過去的經驗給予我們什麼啟示？我國政府在制定產業政策上正面臨什麼挑戰？政府在現在與未來應如何因應調整相關政策？
description.en: This course is to introduce related theories of industrial policy and practice, and review and foresee technology policies in Taiwan and other countries through political economics. Related issues are: What inspirations do we have from past practice? What challenges does our government face when making technology policies? How can the government make appropriate technology policies for now and in the future? Etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標是希望學生瞭解高科技產業管理的相關理論特別是在行銷管理、創新與研發管理、國際企業經營相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with the current major theoretical thrusts in the high-tech management literature. The perspective developed in Marketing Management, innovation and research management, and International Business strategies, provides a useful base for the investigation of research literature.

description.zh: 本課程包含以下議題：網際網路、網路服務、語意網及網路探勘。學生將瞭解網路趨勢、目前的狀況、應用及目前研究面臨的挑戰。1.本課程包含下列四大項目第一部份: Web Service: 概論，技術與應用第二部分: Semantic Web：概論，技術與應用第三部分: Web Mining: 概論，技術與應用第四部分: 整合議題：Semantic web services, Semantic web mining大部分時間將用於第二部份: Semantic Web,期末報告為上述議題之一的實作與展示。
description.en: This is an advanced course involving topics in Internet/Web, Web Services, Semantic Web and Web Mining. Students will gain an understanding of the trends, current status, applications and research challenges of these exciting areas. In this class, we will examine these topic areas by reading and discussing both existing web specifications and cutting-edge research papers. Each area will be organized with an introductory overview, then dive down into the technologies, applications and research challenges. We will also give an overview of where these areas can meet, and examine how a closer integration could be profitable.Part 1: Web Services: Overview, technologies, applicationsPart 2: Semantic Web: Overview, technologies, applicationsPart 3: Web Mining: Overview, technologies, applicationsPart 4: Integration issues: Semantic web services, Semantic web mining.

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

Mechanical & Electric Engineering introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of mechatronics and advanced technology. The topics covered mainly lie in areas of automation technology, mechatronics, advanced manufacturing technology, air conditioning & refrigeration engineering and vehicle engineering.

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括: 最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的loop shaping及loop transfer recovery技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統(可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。

The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

Comparing with MBA, except the courses of general knowledge management, Technology and Innovation Management put more emphasizes on the professional knowledge of hi-tech and related industries.

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

The students should be familiar with the principles of food refrigeration after these lectures.     The topics of this course are:(1) Food storage and equipment.(2) Food microbiology and refrigeration.(3) Refrigerating technology of various food products.(4) Industrial food freezing systems.(5) Distribution technology of chilled and frozen food.(6) Cryogenics in food refrigeration.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。

Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學校公共關係之理論與實務，提供修課學生對學校公共關係的認識。
description.en: The course is designed to develop the ability to manage the school public relation by exploring the concept and principles of school public relation and analyzing the current issues challenging all kinds of  educational institutes.

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行主題探討，同時，就技職教育與訓練或人力資源等領域的相關從業人員進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: The course aims to (1) exploration of the main research in occupation analysis, (2) exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education and training program or in the field of human resource. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育校園環境，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in campus settings. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」
description.en: HS is a thinking model for problem solving, an analysis of the 'known' in order to master the 'unknown' to solve the problem.  The subjective party's cognition is guided by the HS manipulating model, the transfer from 'unknown' to 'known', lets the subjective party construct a heuristic structure in between known and unknown.  The HS theory instruction consists of two courses 1,"The Heuristic Structure Theory"2,"The Application of The Heuristic Structure Theory"

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 授課內容主要在介紹從事都市計畫或都市設計經常習用有關都市方面的資料蒐集、調查以及分析的各種方法，重點涵蓋都市空間理論、人口、產業、交通成長理論及相關的資料調查技術。所使用的分析方法包括統計分析、模式運用、地理資訊系統及試算表分析等，並以實例介紹有關都市人口、產業活動、交通運輸量的分析及預測，使學生能將學習的理論與與實務相結合，增進都市分析的專業能力。
description.en: The course focus is on the training of urban analysis methods to urban planning and design professions. The theories about urban spatial planning, population forecasting, economic development, and transportation analysis are introduced. Emphasis is laid on the methods of data collection and investigation techniques, geographic information system operation, statistics analysis, and spreadsheet utilization. Students are required to complete some related applications to improve both their academic abilities and professional capabilities.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制，電氣控制，數值控制，幾何數據處理，驅動系統，適應控制系統，監視系統與診斷系統，機器人控制，電腦整合精密機械系統．
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理、快速原型系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，快速原型與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
description.en: Principle of rapid prototyping, Classification of rapid prototyping systems, Analysis of manufacturing parameters and working results, Study of manufacturing equipments, Study of rapid tooling, Practice of rapid prototyping and rapid tooling, Special projects and discussion.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 由於台灣地小人稠,為了更有效利用土地,達到更高之生產量,使得土壤污染問題特別顯得重要,因此整治土壤污染是刻不容緩.本課程對於土壤污染之整治由萃取,氣提,固定安定化,淋洗,電熔等物化方法傳授之,其次講授生物復育技術,最後以工程經濟角度,進行本益比分析。.
description.en: There are many remediate methods in this class.The methods include solvent extraction,air stripping,solidification/stabilization,solid flushing,and thermel treatment.This f topicalso includes bioremediation and cost effective analysis.

name.en: Statistics for environmental engineers & experimental design

description.zh: 本課程之目的，在於利用統計學之理論及方式，處理及分析環境領域實驗數據，含基本理論、線性迴歸等。並進一步利用此原理，作實驗中參數簡化對實驗結果之影響，並討論簡化後其參數「相關性」（intercorrelation）之問題，期以最短之實驗時間，得到最佳之實驗效果 本課程之主要講述大綱為1.基本統計學原理及統計學在環境領域之應用2.迴歸分析及統計軟體應用3.模廠實驗之參數及其變化（level）之選擇4.	階乘實驗設計（Factorial design at two levels）5.階乘實驗設計之簡化（Fractional Factorial design at two levels）6.分析階乘實驗設計之結果（Analysis of half-fraction design）
description.en: The goals of this class are to utilize the methodology of the statistics to analyze the data generated in environmental area.  In addition, basic ideas of experimental design with applications, completely randomized design, randomized block design, estimation and tests, analysis of covariance for designed experiments; factorial experiments and determination of optimum factor combinations are also discussed in this class.

description.zh: 環境問題的解決，工程技術仍然是最主要最有效的方法。然而傳統環境工程偏向於問題發生後的管末解決，往往解決了一個問題卻有衍生出新的問題，致使得環境問題無法真正得到解決。本課程著重在從源頭污染的預防，透過清潔生產的技術及環境管理的作為，相輔相成以實際解決企業所面臨的問題。課程內容包含：環境問題總論、風險與暴露及其評估、綠色化學、製程單元之污染預防技術、污染預防機會評估、環境成本會計、生命週期評估，以及工業生態。
description.en: Environmental engineering has been applied for decades and considered one of the most effective approaches in solving the environmental problems. However, traditional engineering didn't really solve the problem but rather shift one problem to another. In this course, cleaner production and pollution prevention techniques will be taught together with some latest environmental management tools to help students understand and use a holistic approach to really solve the environmental problems. Topics of the courses include Introduction to the Environmental Problems, Risk, Exposure and their Assessment, Green Chemistry, Process Units and their Pollution Prevention, P2 Opportunity Assessment, Environmental Cost Accounting, Life Cycle Assessment, and Industrial Ecology.

name.zh: 建構低碳社會理論與實務
name.en: Theory and Practice of Low-Carbon Society

description.zh: 氣候變遷儼然已為全球邁入21世紀所面對最嚴峻國際環保課題，為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取相關因應措施，低碳化已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹節能減碳與低碳社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: Climate change has become the most serious global environmental protection issue into the 21st century. To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, the international community is adopting various response measures. Low-carbonization has become a common global trend. This course will introduce the international trends of "energy saving & carbon reduction" and "low-carbon society". It will also introduce related regulations on greenhouse gases (GHG) reduction, energy security worldwide, as well as Taiwan's GHG reduction and energy saving regulations. The concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced, using international case studies to offer challenges and opportunities for moving toward a low-carbon society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程探討聚合反應及應用反應機構，合成方式包含逐步聚合反應、鏈鎖聚合反應，共聚合反應並研討高分子的化學反應，及其他高分子有關技術。
description.en: The major topics include step reaction polymers, chain reaction polymers, copolymerization, reactions of polymers and polymer technology

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在討論陶瓷性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念與技術。學生將學習開發高品質軟體相關的原理、觀念、方法、與技術。本課程將介紹下列主題：一、軟體工程簡介二、軟體流程模型三、需求工程四、軟體設計方法五、物件導向軟體開發六、軟體測試與驗證七、軟體品質確保八、軟體維護九、軟體專案管理與規劃十、軟體工程進階主題
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with a full awareness of the knowledge and technologies of software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.An Overview of Software Engineering2.Software Process Models3.Requirements Engineering4.Software Design Methods5.Object-Oriented Software Development6.Software Testing Strategy and Tactics7.Software Quality Assurance8.Software Maintenance9.Software Project Management and Planning10.Advanced Topics in Software Engineering

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises.  Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of  emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI與企業資源規劃、BI與電子商務、BI與顧客關係管理等議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，EMBA班學生可以討論其熟悉產業之KPI，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: Business intelligence (BI) is a business management term which refers to applications and technologies which are used to gather, provide access to, and analyze data and information about their company operations. Business intelligence systems can help companies have a more comprehensive knowledge of the factors affecting their business, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and they can help companies to make better business decisions. In this course, shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques, such as RFID, will be introduced firstly. Database and data warehouse concepts will also be mentioned. Applications of BI in ERP, EC and CRM will be the important focus of this course. Students will have a chance to implement BI software based on his business-related data in this course.

name.zh: 智慧財產權與專利管理
name.en: Intellectual Property Rights and patent management

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解智慧財產權與專利管理，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行：（1）智慧財產權基本觀念與實務，（2）專利資訊分析，（3）專利演化與發展，（4）創意產出，（5）專利申請與保護， (6)專利佈局，（7）專利侵權鑑定，（8）專利迴避設計，（9）案例分析。
description.en: This course teaches and coaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management, including topics as follows:（1）Basic knowledge and practices of Intellectual Property Rights;（2）The analysis of patent information;（3）The evolution and development for patent;（4）Innovative idea generation; （5）Application and protection of patent（6）Patent strategy（7）Patent violation，（8）Patent avoidance，（9）Cases study.

name.zh: 互動行銷與消費者行為

description.zh: 消費者會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓消費者認同。這表示，「與消費者的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和消費者直接對話的空間。 這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以消費者行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Consumer behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, consumer behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性，如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。內容：服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論 。
description.en: Service management is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study and Paper discuss .

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對電子化企業經營與管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6. 商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the e-business management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management2.The business model3. Business reengineering4.Enterprise resource planning5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business7.Supply chain management8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

description.zh: 本課程探討處理空間資料的模式與演算法則，主題包含: (1) 空間資料庫介紹與應用, (2) 空間概念與資料模式, (3) 空間搜尋語言, (4) 空間資料儲存與索引, (5) 搜尋處理與最佳化, (6) 空間網路, (7) 空間資料庫的研究趨勢。
description.en: This course studies the models and algorithms for the efficient handling of data related to space. The topics include: (1) Introduction to Spatial Databases, (2) Spatial Concepts and Data Models, (3) Spatial Query Languages, (4) Spatial Storage and Indexing, (5) Query Processing and Optimization, (6) Spatial Networks, and (7) Trends on Spatial Databases.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

description.zh: 本課程將提供系上學生兼具實務與理論之課程特色及專業實務訓練，以強化本系學生對於嵌入式系統軟硬體技術的認識與實作能力，其內容包括： （１）嵌入式系統開發環境建置 （２）嵌入式作業系統與各種自由軟體授權模式簡介 （３） UML於嵌入式軟體工程應用與CMMI標準（４）開放源碼之圖形化介面函式庫與視覺處理函示庫（５）智慧型手持行動裝置 （6）異質多核心平台之開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with design methodologies, tools, and implementation practices of embedded software design. Its topics include: 1. Embedded System Development Platform and Tool-chains. 2. Embedded Operating Systems and Open Source Software Engineering. 3. UML for Embedded Software Engineering and CMMI. 4. Developing Embedded Software Using Opensource GUI and Computer Vision Libraries. 5. Embedded Mobile Devices. 6. Heterogeneous Multi-core Embedded Platforms.

description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.
