description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposa

name.en: Seminar on Channel Strategy and  Management

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略與管理之重要理論與整體架構，明瞭通路成員間的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析、通路管理模式與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢，透過個案研討使學生熟悉通路策略與管理模式之運作。而授課主題包括通路的本質、通路功能與流程、通路行為、通路策略與通路管理等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in channels strategy and   management. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case study, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, channel strategy and channel management.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

name.en: Solar Electrical Energy Technology and Application

description.zh: 太陽能是再生能源之一，太陽能又分為熱能技術轉換和電能技術轉換兩大領域。本課程介紹太陽電能技術轉換系統，包含太陽光電發電系統概論、模組及陣列、支架結構、變流器、蓄電池、直流配電、交流配電、相關儀器、網路併聯、組裝、測試、相關法令規章及實例參觀…等，使學習者有一完整太陽電能技術與應用的觀念。
description.en: Solar energy is one of renewable energy， the Solar energy has divided two field as Heating-transformation and Photovoltaic-transformation。The aim of this course to discuss include photovoltaic-introduction、module and array、structure、converter、battery、DC/AC distributed、instrument、grid-connected system、construction、commissioning、relevant-decree and visiting …etc.。Let students have a complete concept of solar electrical energy technology and application。

description.zh: 本課程主要的內容包括有；生物醫用材料的發展概況及趨勢；生物醫用材料的生物相容性及生物學評價；可降解與吸收材料之機制及調控；組織工程材料與人工器官--軟組織修復與重建；硬組織修復與骨組織工程材料，也就是生物活性陶瓷、金屬植入材料之表面生物活化功能和塗層；口腔材料；控制釋放材料；仿生智能材料；生物醫用材料表面改質等。
description.en: In addition to the fundamentals of surface treatment, biological interactions of materials, mechanical properties, ceramics and composite materials in biomedical application, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials will be introduced.  The contents of this course will include the development of biomaterials, the biocompatibility of materials, mechanisms of biodegradable and bio-absorbable materials. It will illustrate the advanced concepts of medical devices, artificial organs (implants), dental materials, tissue engineering and drug eluting technologies as well.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，模糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹  2.灰色關聯度分析  3.灰色預測原理  4.灰色建模 5.灰色決策      6.灰色控制        7.專題計劃
description.en: The principle and theory of grey system is  interoduced.  Therefore, the student can apply the grey system to information system, control system,image processing, fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry, economy, and management,etc..  The contents of this course is : 1. The introduction of grey system. 2.Grey relational analysis. 3.The theory of grey prediction. 4. The grey modeling. 5. Grey decision 6. Grey control. 7. Final project.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子結構與其特性之關係，內容包括分子量、分子組成及結構、溶液特性、相變化、自組裝性質、彈性行為、粘彈性、動態機械性質、光學、電學和光電特性。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the relationship between polymer structure and properties: focusing on the molecular conformation and configuration, solution and phase behavior, rubber elasticity, viscoelasticity, dynamic mechanical behavior, optic, electronic and optoelectronic properties.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 高階生態規劃設計理論及工具方法引介及論證；討論主題包含生態規劃方法、法定規範體制、規劃設計實證案例研究。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the green buildings and sustainable cities. Its major content includes: 1. Study of Methodology for Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of administrative regulation of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

notes: 英文授課，限本所國際生修課

description.zh: 1. 授課目的：  現代都市計劃及都市設計作業內容中，必須考量都市永續環境生態之議題。本課程之目的即在於傳述都市之生態概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容及其行政程序，以培養學生永續都市及敷地計畫規劃能力。2. 授課內容：  由基本永續都市中，思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。綠建築、永續都市之內容。引介各項生態技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而論證其都計管制規範。3. 作業練習：  本學期藉由實驗操作、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用規劃能力，以利學生認識都市生態技術及都計行政作業之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位規劃思辯能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the environmental planning, green buildings and sustainable urban design. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

name.en: Special Topic on the Aesthetic of Architectural Construciton

description.zh: 在每個文明的進程中，會因為其環境風土條件與技術需求，發展出來其特有的建築營造系統，而在此營造系統中，又會因為建築空間文化形式、材料、審美等不同的內在或是外在的條件，進而發展出在建築的整體空間與構造細部上有不同的作法。本課程分別針對人類的建築歷史上重要的建築文明系統發展與其美學，從希臘時期、羅馬時期、哥德時期的石造建築技術，一直到十九世紀工業革命以後至廿世紀的鑄鐵、鋼鐵、鋼筋混凝土等現代建築發展過程中的建築構造，以材料特性與工法內容分別討論其形貌以及美學建構的內容。
description.en: In Human History, each civilization would develop its construction system, which might be influenced by the physic environment and the technics it requests.  In similar or different construction systems, it would derive into different aspects and ways of combination in the spatial forms and constructive d?tails, due to the inner or outer conditions, such as different cultural forms, materials and aesthetics, etc.This seminar bases on the architectural history of different civilizations, from Greek, Roman, Gothic epochs, to the post industrial r?volution of the Nineteenth Century and Twentieth Century.  We would like to study the aspect and aesthetic through the ancient architecture of mason construction to those modern or modernist architecture of different materials such as iron, steel, or reinforced concrete, etc.

description.zh: 本課程從社會、藝術、環境、哲學思想與文化等角度剖析二十世紀後地景建築所呈現的各種面向。課程含蓋：一、當代地景建築的前身、萌芽與趨勢。二、當代主要思潮與地景建築的詮釋。三、當代地景建築師和作品之批評與研討。
description.en: This course pinpoints on various aspects of landscape architecture from the 20th century onwards. Social, artistic, environmental, philosophical, and cultural viewpoints involved along the flow of contemporary landscape architecture are to be included. Contents consists of:   1 The germs, predecessors and trends of contemporary landscape architecture.   2 Contemporary interpret on landscape architecture.   3 Critics and Seminars on landscape architects and works of contemporary significance.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-布局全球‧放眼國際

description.zh: 本課程藉由企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以企業品牌之實際案例，讓同學們更能了解品牌行銷非一蹴可及，惟有落實長期經營才能獲得此成效。亦培養同學獨立思考之能力，減少自行摸索的時間，輕鬆掌握品牌觀念與實務，成為炙手可熱的品牌行銷人才。
description.en: The course aims to develop the knowledge and skills needed to prepare the managers to create an enduring advantage for their brand. Through sharing the experiences and case study on brand management, integrated marketing communication, and export promotion by enterprises, students can benefit to apply the knowledge and concepts in practical brand management. They can inspired independent and creative thinking on brand marketing from the course; moreover, they can trained for branding marketing talents in global arena.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新與創業
name.en: Model of Entrepreneurs –Internet Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 隨著資訊技術與網路科技的發展，促成了城市發展的新樣態。IBM公司在全球化背景下針對社會變遷、科技應用、綠能環保、及永續發展等問題，提出了「智慧城市」的新思維。在國際間也引發其研究與規劃的創新領域。台灣近幾年來為能達成「智慧台灣」的發展目標，並推動台灣的智慧城市及相關產業發展，經濟部技術處在2009年中成立了「經濟部智慧生活科技運用計畫推動辦公室」，以推動智慧生活科技運用計畫，除將帶動「智慧生活」產業的發展，也將師法國外典範進行「智慧城市」的規劃，打造台灣的智慧城市。本課程即在上述國家重大發展策略的架構下，引領建築與都市設計研究所的研究生，透過專論與實作的方式，探討未來「智慧城市」的思維，並透過與資訊科技跨領域知識的整合，融入智慧生活的需求，提出「智慧城市」規劃的架構、願景與策略。
description.en: This course introduces graduate students to the newly developed concept about the intelligent cities and how they are planned and implemented. The concept of intelligent city was proposed by the IBM with globalization background. It is a new and innovation research field, which include inter-discipline integration. The course is organized into two parts:  Part1 explore the Basic which to form an intelligent city. It will start with classroom lecture, speech and paper reading and using intelligent cities case study around the world as references. We will examine the key components that form an intelligent city.Part2 will use a target community as a practical case study area and use people participation and community enforcement model to propose a prototype of an intelligent city will be. The results will be illustrated and presented to the local community.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線2.散射參數3.微波主動元件4.寬頻放大電路5.低雜訊放大電路6.功率放大器7.高穩定振盪器8.壓控振盪器9.鎖相迴路10.混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

description.zh: 1.高速PCB佈線設計的流程與基本原理 2.高速PCB的阻抗特性與反射現象 3.傳輸線的串音現象 4.電源與接線佈線技術 5.高速PCB中穿孔、連接器與IC封裝的探討 6.輸出入緩衝器資訊規格模型 7.高速PCB的量測技術 8.案例說明
description.en: 1.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed PCB Layout Design 2.Impedance Characteristic and Reflections in High-Speed PCB 3. Crosstalk in High-Speed PCB 4.Layout Technology of Power and Connection Lines 5.Discussion of Vias, Connectors, and Packages in High-Speed PCB 6.IBIS (I/O Buffer Information Specification) model 7.Measurement Technology of High-Speed PCB 8. Case Study

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1)奈米薄膜製程與檢測技術：奈米薄膜之定義、種類，奈米薄膜特性與應用，奈米薄膜製程，物理蒸鍍法，化學蒸鍍法，超微結構之觀察、微區/微量之化學組成分析，微奈米材料之機械性質檢測，微奈米材料之磁性、光、電性檢測，微奈米材料檢測所需試片之加工技術。(2)奈米生物科技：細胞生物學，分子細胞生物學，病毒，DNA與蛋白質操控，光電生物技術，奈微米製程技術，生物高分子監測系統整合實例介紹，專題報告。(3)矽奈米電子元件：奈米矽技術簡介，奈米矽元件前瞻物理，各種奈米電子元件可能之應用，奈米矽元件之電特性量測，專題報告。
description.en: (1) Nano Thin Film Processing and Characterizations: Definition classification, characteristics, and applications of nano-film, fabrication process, the related metrology and analysis tools of nano material. (2) Nanobiotechnology: Introduction of cytobiology, molecular cell virus, manipulation of DNA and protein, optoelectronics metrology on biotechnology, nano/micro fabrication technology, case study of biopolymer detection system. (3) Sliconnano electronic device: Introduction of nano silicon technology, advanced physics of nano silicon device predicted applications of variety of nano electronic device, electrical measurement of nano silicon device.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 1.高速PCB佈線設計的流程與基本原理 2.高速PCB的阻抗特性與反射現象 3.傳輸線的串音現象 4.電源與接線佈線技術 5.高速PCB中穿孔、連接器與IC封裝的探討 6.輸出入緩衝器資訊規格模型 7.高速PCB的量測技術 8.案例說明
description.en: 1.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed PCB Layout Design 2.Impedance Characteristic and Reflections in High-Speed PCB 3. Crosstalk in High-Speed PCB 4.Layout Technology of Power and Connection Lines 5.Discussion of Vias, Connectors, and Packages in High-Speed PCB 6.IBIS (I/O Buffer Information Specification) model 7.Measurement Technology of High-Speed PCB 8. Case Study

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 本課程將給學生從較廣義的風險管理範疇對風險值有一番認識與瞭解，主要包含以下三個部份：第一部份介紹風險值，將從近來風險管理的理論與實務發展討論其起源與基本觀念；第二部份說明衡量風險值的方法，包括變異數共變數法、歷史模擬、蒙地卡羅模擬及壓力測試；第三部份從風險值的觀點說明風險管理的相關議題，包括1) 決策法則，例如投資與避險法則。2) 信用風險。3)流動性、作業及法律風險。4)資本配置。5)企業風險管理。
description.en: This course gives students an overview of VaR, viewed in its broader risk management context. Totally, there will be three parts in this course. Part One is an introduction, which discusses the origins and basics of VaR in the context of recent developments in the theory and practice of risk management. Part Two deals with the approaches of measuring VaR, including variance-covariance approach, historical simulation, Mote Carlo simulation and stress testing. Part Three then deals with risk management issues from a VaR perspective, including 1) decision-making rules, such as investment and hedging rules; 2) credit risks; 3) liquidity, operational and legal risks; 4) capital allocation; 5) firm-wide risk management.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises.  Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

name.en: Special topics in mineral resources engineering 1

description.zh: 為增強學生對於學術論文的研究能量，本課程針對本所研究生對於資源處理與材料製程個別研究領域做更深層之學術與工業應用專業養成。內容包含各指導教授專業領域進階鑽研、研究室未來發展研究領域之開創與新研究團隊共同學術探討....等等。選課事項: 必須針對研究生個別之研究方向經指導教授同意選擇適當之課程。
description.en: In order to investigate of an advanced nature leading to the preparation of a thesis or dissertation, this course deals with the theory and industrial practice of mineral resources engineering. It covers the specific research and development topics in raw materials and mineral resources reutilization.Prerequisite: Permission of advisor, based on adequate background in relative reseach field.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中演算法的原理、分析與設計策略，使學生了解各種演算法的設計，訓練如何分析解決實際的問題，以便學生可以設計有效率的電腦演算法程式，進而了解問題的難易，增加實作演算法能力。課程內容包括學習分析一個演算法的複雜度與界定一個問題難度的下界，並完整介紹整套NP-completeness計算理論。其中關於解決問題所使用的有效技巧，課程中將介紹一般常用的「貪婪法」、「各個擊破法」、「樹狀搜尋法」、「修剪與搜尋」、與「動態規劃法」及其它主題。同時課程中也將簡介演算法新的發展方向，包括「近似演算法」、「攤還分析」、「隨機演算法」、「線上演算法」等概念。最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，以了解近代演算法的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Mathematical background、Basic analysis techniques、Computational complexities、Worst case analysis and average case analysis、Basic Design Paradigms、Divide and conquer、Greedy methods、Dynamic programming、Probabilistic algorithms、Computational Complexity、Linear reduction of problems、NP-completeness。

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 1.傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2.離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3.Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程的目的在介紹生物反應工程，也就是如何將工程原理應用在生物程序。本課程內容可分為二大部分：生物系統的概述與工程的原理應用，第一部分將包括細胞的結構、複製與生長，生物化學反應的種類及其特性，細胞的主要代謝路徑等，第二部分則探討生物反應器的種類及其操作特性與應用，生物反應器內的質傳、熱傳及流動型態，產品回收與純化。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of bioprocess engineering, which is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze bioprocesses. The course will first survey the basics ideas from microbiology and biochemistry. Subsequently, the emphasis will be the application of engineering concepts to biological problems. The following topics will be included: enzyme kinetics, major metabolic pathways, cell growth, stoichiometry, bioreactor operation, and product recovery and purification.

description.zh: 本課程係提供全校學生與創意理論與實務界交流的平台，提供學生建立創意發展的理論與實務經驗，協助學生進行創意開展之操作，透過邀請國內著名之設計與發明界相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，及舉辦創意工作營(workshop)與分組討論教學，經由專家學者之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生創意進行相關產品之研發，開發學生創意之潛能。
description.en: This class provides a platform for students to communicate with creative scholars and industry specialists in order to gain more experience of developing creativity and practice. Aiming to stimulate students' creative thinking and product developing ability, this class holds creative workshops &, group discussions, and invites famous experts of industry, official and academic territories to give speeches.

notes: 四設三及四.創新所.最後一哩(限非設計學院20人）合開

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 醫療器材簡介、我國醫療器材管理制度與發展趨勢、FDA/ISO醫療器材認證制度、醫療器材開發流程與風險分析、醫療器材生物相容性質測試 (ISO 10993)、醫療器材醫電相容性質測試、醫療器材軟體驗證、良產品製造規範(Good Manufacturing Practice, GMP)、優良實驗室操作(Good Laboratory Practice, GLP)、優良細胞操作規範 (Good Tissue Practice, GTP)、醫療器材優良臨床試驗(Good Clinical Practice, GCP)、醫療器材臨床試驗基本考量：醫學倫理與病患安全、醫療器材的臨床試驗與查核、醫療器材上市審查、案例討論（I）人工植體、案例討論(II) 軟體開發、案例討論(III) 血液透析相關產品、Final Exam / 期末報告
description.en: Medical Equipment Introduction 2. Taiwan medical equipment management system and development trends 3. FDA / ISO certification system of medical equipment 4. Medical equipment development process and risk analysis 5. Biocompatibility of medical devices quality test (ISO 10993) 6. Medical equipment compatible with medical electrical test 7. Medical equipment software verification 8. Good Manufacturing Practice, GMP 9. Good Laboratory Practice, GLP 10. Good Tissue Practice, GTP 11. Good Clinical Practice, GCP 12. The basic considerations of clinical trials of medical equipment: Medical Ethics and Patient Safety 13. Medical devices in clinical trials and Audit 14. Medical equipment market review 15. Case study (I) implant 16. Case study (II) Software Development 17. Case study (III) hemodialysis related products 18. Final Exam / Final report

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-人資需求大搜密

description.zh: 本課程透過知名企業主管及各大領域專家與同學交流，透過他們職場多年經驗與同學分享時間管理與壓力管力、職場生存技巧，強化學生的職場力與人生定位的觀念，最後並安排企業參訪協助學生提早瞭解自我性向,發覺潛能,做好生涯規劃，開設「就業講座(二)-企業家的用人哲學」之課程，藉由企業參訪與業界實際案例，提前為進入做好身心靈的準備。
description.en: The course mainly invites managers and experts of well-known enterprises to share working experience and professional knowledge. After the classes with experts and industrial managers, the course includes an industrial visit to help students to gain more ideas about career. The course is eventually expected to have the result of emphasizing student's capabilities in terms of future work and life planning. Hope the course can provide a direction and some knowledge to students and they can be more prepared to work.

notes: 四化四甲乙、化工所與最後一哩合開(限180人)

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生懂得基本的微生物學外，更將引導學生練習閱讀一些國外期刊的最新研究，內容包括：微生物分子遺傳、微生物免疫、微生物生理及微生物與藥物等知識。
description.en: This course will let students to learn basic microbiology; furthermore, will introduce students to learn how to read SCI journals and new knowledge in microbiology. It contains molecular genetics of microorganisms, immunology of microorganisms, physiology of microorganisms and the relationships between microorganisms and drugs.

name.en: Service Systems Design and Risk Management

description.zh: 藉由服務系統之本質與內涵之定義，使學生了解服務系統之規劃策略、設計、與作業面之運作考量，達成一個有效的服務系統，並滿足顧客之最終需求。此外，在進行服務設計同時，亦需考量過程中所具備之風險。透過認識風險管理的思維邏輯與策略模式，並從中學習正確的風險管理知識，以避免設計失敗。課程中亦加入適當之國內、外服務系統之個案分析，使學生了解相關之成功實施個案之精華所在。
description.en: This course is focused on the definitions and contents of service system and investigates the planning, design, and operational perspectives of these service systems to effect. Moreover, risk during the service design is concerned. Learning the theory of risk management is also the key issue in this course. Provides cases can help students get the insights of their successful operational decision.

description.zh: 面對地球資源逐漸枯竭的當下, 投入大量生產物量的建築興建模式必須有所變革, 才能因應減低環境負荷的需求。目前建築資源能否有效地再利用的課題在各先進國家受到相當多的矚目。故本課程以介紹海外各種再利用的案例手法為出發點, 並配合台灣地區國情探討建築再利用的可能性與面臨課題。專題討論內容■ 建築再利用之導論與定義   ■ 建築再利用的主要理論與手法   ■ 歐洲及日本的既有地區性集合住宅群的再生實例探討           ■ 建築填充體的更新         ■ 建物內的隔間改造與擴充, 建築                               主體的增建與減建               ■ 外部裝修的保存與再利用   ■ 建築資材的他用途轉用         ■ 建築再利用與都市更新     ■ 建築再利用於台灣面臨的多面向課題(法令與市場)
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the management of building projects, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.zh: 文化創意產業知識管理
name.en: Knowledge Management for Cultural Creative Industries

description.zh: 文化創意產業的發展是目前創新產業發展的趨勢。本課程將從知識管理的角度與觀點探討文化創意產業知識的管理與知識資產的建置。本課程首先將定義何謂文化創意產業，其次將探討如何導入知識管理的概念架構與技術，針對所選定的文化創意產業案例及主題，做知識經營層面及知識資產的創造與應用分析。並評估文化創意產業知識管理導入的方式，與知識加值應用與評估的方法。本課程的主要目標除提供創意與互動設計研究所，知識管理的基礎理論基礎外，也將透過文化創意產業之創新案例及主題，提供同學發展知識管理實務的實務經驗。
description.en: The development of Cultural Creative Industries is nowadays becoming a fashion of innovation industrial development. This course will discuss how to manage the knowledge asset and create their values in Cultural Creative Industries from the perspective of knowledge management. This course will begin with the discussion on the definition of the Cultural Creative Industries. Then, follow the discussion on how to introduce the basic knowledge management framework and technologies to analyze, evaluate and create the values of the knowledge assets in Cultural Creative Industries. The main objective of this course will provide students practical experiences on the implementation of knowledge management in Cultural Creative Industries through various case studies in different categories.

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

description.zh: 開課：機電、製科所合開（上學期）(含一般生、在職生)本課程說明RFID系統架構，技術、編碼、和應用標準，資訊系統，效益評估，隱私權問題，及各領域或產業的創新應用和案例。
description.en: This course is to explain the RFID system structure, the standard of technology, object coding and applications, IT solution systems, ROI considerations, privacy issues, and then the innovative applications in different field or industry.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.
